course_description: The course is designed to develop fluency in spoken Russian as well as enhance writing skills, vocabulary development, and reading and listening comprehension. Using Russian film as a basis for conversation provides students with a wealth of culture-based authentic materials.
sections: Class Nbr: 2122, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: E. Glazov-Corrigan, Status: Open
